item.title: Problems With Autotalker Trading script!
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

Here it is. It does all what you asked for. It will stop talking when a trade box is up, accepts both trades. I made you a very little progress report right after it accepts both trades. And when you say thanks or the message2 it will also say that persons name you traded with. This script will log out when you traded the exact times you set it to. The set up line is on line 40.

I think this is what you are asking for any problems just ask.
If your having problems it might have to deal with the SetChats procedure.
You need to have something or two or more options off for the trading to work.

[scar]{_______________________________________________________________________________
______________________________******
______________________________________________________________________________
_______________***_____________________/___________________
_______________________________******_________/ *
_/________*_*\ _/_______
____________/__________*___ _/________
___***********_______*_

{ !=$JUNKY PRODUCTIONS$=! }
{__________________________!READ AT OWN RISK!__________________________________}
{ !NOT! !RESPONSIBLE FOR any BANNED ACOUNT! }
{ 2nd VERSION OF AUTOTALKER }
{ !REPORT ANY BUGS OR STUFF THAT DOESNT WORK! }
{!where ever it says “ONLY CHANGE THIS” read or change what its talking about! }
{ !!!IF COPIED,SOME OF THE CREDIT GOES TO ME, DO NOT SAY ALL TO YOU!GOSH!!! }
{ ±+SPECIAL THANKS TO±+ }
{ BULLZEYE }
{ JUNIOR }
{ AND OTHERS THAT HELPED (or copied from((SORRY!)) }
{ ENJOY THE JUNKY SCRIPT THAT IS UPDATED,LOOK BELOW FOR MORE UPDATES! }
//////////////////////////////////|||:|||\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
{VERSION 1.0—ask for it nicely
{VERSION 1.1— THIS IS IT! {trades and logs out!!!}
{VERSION 1.2— COMING SOON {Goes to the bank,puts the money in and logs out!!}

         {PLEASE REMEMBER BANNED ACOUNTS ARE NOT MY PROBLEM!}

{________________________________ENJOY!________________________________________}
program autotalker;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/misc/trade.scar}

const
message1=(‘buying air runes!’); //type what you want him/her to say.}
message2=(‘Thanks’); // DO NOT CHANGE THIS!!!
RandomTime=1000;//Change to set random time,EX=(1000-infinite=sec,1-999=Msec)
RandomTime2=3000;

Const
HowMuchToTrade=20; //How many times you want it to trade before it logs out.

procedure autotalk;
begin
wait(4000+random(RandomTime)) // change random time above
SendKeys(Message1 + Chr(13))
end;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
Procedure SetChats;
Begin
SetChat(‘Hide’, 1);
SetChat(‘Off’, 2);
SetChat(‘Off’, 3);
End;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
Procedure Progress;
Begin
Writeln(‘Running for ‘+(TimeRunning)+’’);
Writeln(‘Went Through ‘+(IntToStr(Trades))+’ trades!’);
End;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//--------------------Credit Go’s to arrow(sorry for copying!)----------------\
Procedure Trading;
Var
TraderName: string;
colonx, colony :integer;
Begin
AcceptTrade;
Wait(2000+Random(2000))
If Not(TradeScreen)Then
Begin
Exit;
End Else
If(TradeScreen)Then
Begin
TraderName:=trim(gettextatex(colonx+8, colony, 0, upchars, false, true, 0, 2, 65535, 12, false, tr_AlphaNumericChars))
Wait(1500+Random(1500))
Accept;
Wait(15000+Random(RandomTime2))//change how long it takes to trade
Accept;
Wait(500+Random(600));
SendKeysSilent(message2 + (TraderName) + Chr(13));
Trades := Trades + 1
Progress;
End
End;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
begin
SetUpSRL;
ActivateClient;
ClearDebug;
SetChats;
Writeln(’<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>’);
Writeln(‘YoU aRe NoW UsInG JuNkYj"S sCrIpT’);
Writeln(‘ReMeMbEr To ReAd ThE StUfF aT tHe ToP’);
Writeln(‘If CoPiEd CrEdIt GoEs To JuNkJ!’);
Writeln(‘ThAnK yOu FoR UsInG jUnKj"s AuToTaLkEr!’);
Writeln(‘PrEsS CtRl+AlT+s To StOp’);
Writeln(’<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>’);
repeat
autotalk;
Trading;
until(Trades = HowMuchToTrade)
If(Trades = HowMuchToTrade)Then
Begin
Writeln(‘JuNkYj"S scipt has been succesfully finished’);
Progress;
Logout;
TerminateScript;
End;
end.
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Problems With Autotalker Trading script!
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

I had lots of problems with my trading autotalker,and somethings i dont know how to do!
problem:
dunno but theres alot

Need to:

Need to stop autotalking when trade box comes up
Need to make it accept both trade boxes.
Need to Log out.

[scar]{_______________________________________________________________________________
______________________________******
______________________________________________________________________________
_______________***_____________________/___________________
_______________________________******_________/ *
_/________*_*\ _/_______
____________/__________*___ _/________
___***********_______*_

{ !=$JUNKY PRODUCTIONS$=! }
{__________________________!READ AT OWN RISK!__________________________________}
{ !NOT! !RESPONSIBLE FOR any BANNED ACOUNT! }
{ 2nd VERSION OF AUTOTALKER }
{ !REPORT ANY BUGS OR STUFF THAT DOESNT WORK! }
{!where ever it says “ONLY CHANGE THIS” read or change what its talking about! }
{ !!!IF COPIED,SOME OF THE CREDIT GOES TO ME, DO NOT SAY ALL TO YOU!GOSH!!! }
{ ±+SPECIAL THANKS TO±+ }
{ BULLZEYE }
{ JUNIOR }
{ AND OTHERS THAT HELPED (or copied from((SORRY!)) }
{ ENJOY THE JUNKY SCRIPT THAT IS UPDATED,LOOK BELOW FOR MORE UPDATES! }
//////////////////////////////////|||:|||\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
{VERSION 1.0—ask for it nicely
{VERSION 1.1— THIS IS IT! {trades and logs out!!!}
{VERSION 1.2— COMING SOON {Goes to the bank,puts the money in and logs out!!}

         {PLEASE REMEMBER BANNED ACOUNTS ARE NOT MY PROBLEM!}

{________________________________ENJOY!________________________________________}
program autotalker;
{Include SRL/SRL.SCAR}
{SRL/SRL/Misc/Trade.SCAR}

const
message1=(‘buying air!’); //type what you want him/her to say.}
message2=(‘Ty and np’); // DO NOT CHANGE THIS!!!
RandomTime=1000;//Change to set random time,EX=(1000-infinite=sec,1-999=Msec)
RandomTime2=3000;

procedure autotalk;
begin
wait(4000+random(RandomTime)) // change random time above
SendKeys(Message1 + Chr(13))
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//--------------------Credit Go’s to arrow(sorry for copying!)----------------\
Procedure Trading;
Begin
AcceptTrade;
Wait(15000+Random(RandomTime2))//change how long it takes to trade
Accept;
Accept;
Wait(1000+Random(600));
SendKeysSilent(message2 + Chr(13));
Tradess := Trades + 1
End;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
begin
ActivateClient;
ClearDebug;
Tradelogout;
Writeln(’<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>’)
Writeln(‘YoU aRe NoW UsInG JuNkYj"S sCrIpT’)
Writeln(‘ReMeMbEr To ReAd ThE StUfF aT tHe ToP’)
Writeln(‘If CoPiEd CrEdIt GoEs To JuNkJ!’)
Writeln(‘ThAnK yOu FoR UsInG jUnKj"s AuToTaLkEr!’)
Writeln(‘PrEsS CtRl+AlT+s To StOp’)
Writeln(’<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>’)
repeat
autotalk;
until(Tradelogout)
end.
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
[/scar]

Or you can just fix it 1 by 1 for the problems and needs!
